text: Ninel Miculescu (born May 15, 1985) is a Romanian weightlifting champion. He is the European champion of the 69 kg category in 2010. In late 2011 the International Weightlifting Federation (IWF) banned Ninel Miculescu for life, for the second doping violation.Sanctioned Athletes / Athlete Support Personnel. iwf.net ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian male weightlifters Category:Doping cases in weightlifting Category:Romanian sportspeople in doping cases Category:Sportspeople banned for life Category:European Weightlifting Championships medalists Category:World Weightlifting Championships medalists
